thread.title: This Sad Michigan Fan Is Now An Ohio State T-Shirt
thread.title_full: This Sad Michigan Fan Is Now An Ohio State T-Shirt

author: Campus Insiders Staff
title: This Sad Michigan Fan Is Now An Ohio State T-Shirt
text:
This Sad Michigan Fan Is Now An Ohio State T-Shirt Campus Insiders 1 day ago Campus Insiders Staff Michigan fans had their hearts ripped out and stomped on by the Michigan State Spartans on Saturday night. A botched punt led to a Sparty touchdown as time expired, making for one of the wildest endings in college football history.
AdChoices One Michigan fan's face perfectly summed up the insane moment.
The face of every #Michigan fan everywhere. Wow... pic.twitter.com/oL27NgUNjF
â€” Andrew Kulha (@FootballScout44) October 17, 2015
Adding insult to injury in the worst kind of way, he now has his very own Ohio State t-shirt . Cincy Shirts calls it "The Disappointments Up North."
Clever, yet so very, very cold-hearted. Two days after one of the most gut-wrenching losses in Michigan history and this guy is just trying to move on. Wouldn't wish that on our worst enemy. Here's to hoping he's a glass-half-full kind of person and uses his newfound fame to his advantage. Maybe a fee for using his likeness is in order.
WATCH: Top 3 Most Heartbreaking Michigan Football Losses
